sync_connection_config_failed: Failed to sync connection configuration, please check backend service

size.title: File Too Large
size.messageImport: File size exceeds the limit and cannot be imported
size.messageExport: File size exceeds the limit and cannot be exported
size.suggestionImport: Please split the file into multiple files smaller than 10MB, or use streaming import
size.suggestionExport: Please reduce the amount of exported data or use batch export

encoding.title: File Encoding Error
encoding.message: Unable to parse file encoding correctly
encoding.suggestion: Please ensure the file uses UTF-8 encoding, or specify the correct encoding when importing

invalid.title: Invalid File Format
invalid.message: Unsupported file format or corrupted file
invalid.suggestion: Please check if the file format is correct and ensure the file is not corrupted

mismatch.title: File Format Mismatch
mismatch.message: File content does not match the selected format
mismatch.suggestion: Please verify the file format or select the correct import format

schema.title: Data Schema Validation Failed

schema.suggestion: Please check the data structure and ensure all required fields are present

dataType.title: Data Type Error

dataType.suggestion: Please adjust the data type to match the target table requirements

critical.suggestion: Recommend closing other applications, reducing query data volume, or restarting the application

high.title: High Memory Usage

high.suggestion: Recommend optimizing query conditions or processing data in batches

leak.suggestion: Please restart the application. If the problem persists, please contact technical support

cpu.suggestion: Please wait for the current operation to complete, or consider optimizing query complexity

critical.title: Disk Space Critical
critical.suggestion: Please clean up disk space immediately, otherwise the application may not work properly

high.title: Disk Space Low

readonly.title: Disk Read-Only

slow.title: Slow Network Connection
